summary:
The Demigod Power is only at your grasp!
Unleash the power of the true Demigod to strike down every foe even if they're Essential or Protected.
descriptionHtml:
[i][size=5][b]**Please [u]ENDORSE[/u] this if you want to support
[/b][/size]



[/i][size=6][u]First[/u] :)[/size]
[size=4]My English isn't strong so I'm sorry.[/size]


[size=4]Give the death as a gift to every foe you've fought!
When the Demigod has awaken. Nirn's tremble. And anyone that against the Demigod will not survive.[/size]


[size=6][u]Demigod as a boss[/u][/size]
[size=4]The original mod is [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60007][size=5]The True Demigod[/size][/url][size=4] that add the Demigod Boss to the game.[/size]


[size=6][u]What's this?[/u][/size]
[size=5][b]This Mod Add New Power that summon up the Demigod
[/b][/size][size=4]** "POWER" Mean its can only be used once a day.[/size]
[size=4]The Demigod is now able to be summoned! 
Unleash the power of the Demigod to strike down every foe even if they're Essential or not!
Dominate Skyrim with the Demigod's might, Conquer all the capital holds or even send everyone that's not obey to your command to Sovngarde with the Demigod's wrath.
To get the power, Go to the Strange chest near the Shrine of Talos at Whiterun.[/size]


[u][size=6]Requirement
[/size][/u][size=4]Skyrim, Official Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLC.[/size]


[u][size=6]How to install
[/size][/u][size=4]Extract everything from zip file into Data folder.
If U want to use it multiple times a day then change the spell into to lesser power in CK.[/size][size=4][size=3]

[/size][/size]
[u][size=6]History
[/size]
1.0
[/u][size=4]-Mod added to Nexus.[/size]



[i][size=5][b]**Please endorse this if you want to support.[/b][/size][/i]
author: jimboom555
